2020 IMPACT REPORTStakeholders
We maintain a fluid and 
transparent relationship 
with all the people and 
organizations that are 
our stakeholders, to get to know their 
expectations and concerns and translate 
them into information of strategic value 
for the management of our business.
 
We conduct an internal process to 
identify and select stakeholders based on 
interaction and business impact criteria. 
The following table summarizes the dialog 
mechanisms with each of them.⊲ SUSTAINABILITY STRATEGY
Dialog mechanism
- Customer service area
- Marketing surveys
- Training and breakfasts run by the Commercial and Sustainability area
- Mailings
- Internal communication platform (Facebook at Work)
- Talks with the CEO
- Close of quarter communications
- Q&A with directors
- Environment surveys and feedback
- Virtual meetings and mailings
- Mercado Libre Solidario Program
- Audit Committee and Board meetings
- Meetings and information sent periodically
- Quarterly results report
- Meetings with the Governmental Relationships and Sustainability area
- Meetings with the Investor Relations and Sustainability areaStakeholder
